Just bought this game and I have to tell you that I played CS:GO for over 5 years in 2 accounts, never played CS:S before, I played 1.6 when I was a little kid but never CS:S, and what a surprise this game is so nice, I know it's  a FPS game but actually it warms my heart I hate that I never played this game since now, at the end of 2020 and I'm 20 years old, I think that my childhood was better with this game!

Well done Valve, well done.
nice game, it's not heavy and very fun!

Well, i've played it only for 262 hrs which is not that much but only for those hours experience of CS:S, i can say its really good like: good physics, good shooting, no matchmaking. Instead you can go have fun in community servers and gain skills there, practically no cheaters (VAC secured servers) for me its much better than CS 1.6, CS 1.6 weapons are unbalanced, hitboxes are bad, sounds are bad; CS GO is total bullshit, like matchmaking is awful ,terrible, very bad. It wants you to pay 12,75 euro to get Prime, at all CS GO is money machine for Valve, everything to grab a money, some bullshit stats thing, skins, cases and everythin bullshit; So at this case CS:S has better recoil, weapons are more balanced, after v34 hitboxes are kinda fucked up but it doesnt matter that much, its still acceptable. And actually try to do something good in CS:S like download aim training map, and  dont play on those clown ass russian servers filled with 1 TB mods and playing with bullshit 87 ping. I recommend the german servers in CS:S: they aint filled with that much mods, most of them are on the good old classic maps and ping is pretty like normal and playable. CS:S maps are made very well: they look very beautiful, good positions, good places, the most cool thing about them is that they are filled with quite of diversing ambiences on the maps, de_dust2 is filled with guitar ambiences, bongo. Inferno it self has many details, on the bombsite with the fountain and fruit cases when you blow it up, the fountain gets destroyed, cases, fruits everywhere and ofc it becames on fire, on the other bombsite when you blow it up there is a overhang and when the bomb detonates succesfully, the overhang falls down broken on pieces and the place becomes on fire. At all CS:S has very detailed and beautiful, good looking maps, the physics are good, full animations, models are also very well made, the shooting is realistic, muzzleflash is good, recoil is good and easy controllable, smooth gameplay, smooth walking animation. CS:S may be the best game from Counter-Strike series. Guys i really recommend it, its quite cheap and the money are really worth it! :)
vale muita a pena comprar e um dos melhores cs da pra fazer o que quiser com ele

Старая добрая [b] "Source" [/b] вышедшая в 2004 году с очень даже хорошей графикой для того года, а также слишком рано, потому что тогда была популярна [b] "Counter strike 1.6" [/b], сама игра очень даже хороша в плане физики, графики, также на этой части можно поиграть в старые карты, для некоторых эта часть [b] "Counter strike" [/b] остается до сих пор любимой и не забытой.
This game is super fun, especially for bhopping and stuff. worth it and also very high frames

After 8 years playing it, I didn't improve my skills in-game.

However, I learned new language skills: now I can curse in Russian and Brazilian Portuguese.

Also, my tolerance level to guttural screams and loud sounds was increased.

Now I can bear the crying of my children for longer and I can make them feel better by singing sweet traditional songs from other cultures, such as Очи чёрные (Dark Eyes) or Garota de Ipanema (The Girl from Ipanema).

In conclusion, Counter Strike transformed me into a better father and a better person, in addition to making me more patient, tolerant to hateful people and more trained in languages and cultures.

Better than any psychiatric therapy. 10/10

A classic never dies. It's also one of the few games where people will actually use voice chat.

Apesar de não possuir gráficos tão bons quando o CS:GO, o Source é o melhor CS até agora justamente por ser simples e direto: escolha um lado, compre suas armas e parta para o conflito e/ou objetivo.  10/10

If you have never played a FPS game this is not a good entry point because most players have been playing since the 90's - early 2000's. If you have FPS experience then you will find this game enjoyable once you get used the pace and instant death headshots. 

Personally I believe this holds up much better than CSGO... There are no microtransactions, no need to spend $1000's trying to get a knife skin. 

This game is for a far more mature audience than the new title CSGO & that is reflected in team voice chat. Often you will get matched with adults, it's been months since I've matched and had what sounds like somebody under the age of about 15 in my lobby. 

Simple bare-bones shooter gameplay, no frills, no money grabs, just a cheap legendary game that will never go out of style.

It's the original, but more HD. It's pretty epic.

Also it helps me run Garry's Mod

Das ist ein sehr gutes Spiel, sehr attraktives Gameplay und eine nicht all zu komplexe Steuerung wird ebenfalls geboten. Im Gegensatz zum Nachfolger Counter Strike Global Offensive funktioniert auch der Hurensohn Anticheat.
